title: Chewable Immune Health Supplements for Kids | Immune Balance
description: Introducing Gut Connection® Kids Immune Balance. Fun chewables provide your kids with the nutrients they need to maintain gut & immune health. Buy here now!
cleaned_text: - On Sale Gut Connection® Kids Immune Balance You asked, we listened - introducing Gut Connection® Kids, an extension of the popular adult line. With fun and tasty animal-shaped chewables, kids will love taking their supplements. Kids Immune Balance is a scientifically formulated blend of prebiotics balanced with other immune-supporting ingredients to support a strong & healthy immune system and improve gut microbiome health.** Check out what's inside: - EpiCor® dried yeast fermentate: helps maintain good digestive and immune health and reinforces the immune system's first line of defense** - PreticX: helps feed the probiotics in your child's gut** - Wellmune®: helps the body maintain good health in times of stress** Age Groups: 4 and up Try any product from the Gut Connection line with confidence, with our Money Back Guarantee. Based on results from a study using a dynamic model representing GI digestion. Wellmune® is a registered trademark of Kerry Group. EpiCor® is a registered trademark of Embria Health Sciences, LLC. PreticX is a trademark of AIDP Inc. Age Groups: 4 and up MONEY BACK GUARANTEE You'll love it! If you are not completely satisfied, request a refund in 60 days.
